info.title: Animal Management API
info.description:
API for managing animals, including CRUD operations and detailed animal information.
 *      Workflow: First, register and log in to the system. Then, create an animal to generate a unique animal_id (UUID). Use this animal_id to create tasks, notes, and other related data.

get.summary: Get activities for a specific animal

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Filter activities up to this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

get.summary: Get authenticated user data

avatar.description: Image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, max 2MB)

post.description: Send a new email verification notification to the authenticated user.

200.description: Verification link sent or email already verified

post.description: Send a password reset link to the provided email.

email.description: The email address to send the reset link to

status.example: We have emailed your password reset link!

422.description: Validation failed or email not found

items.example: We can't find a user with that email address.

post.description: Creates a new user account. This endpoint is exempt from CSRF protection.

422.description: Validation failed or email already registered

items.example: This email address is already in use.

get.summary: Verify the user's email address
get.description: Verify the authenticated user's email address.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: The hash from the verification link

ActivityResource.title: Activity Resource
ActivityResource.description: A resource representing an animal activity

id.description: The unique identifier of the activity

animal_id.description: The ID of the animal associated with this activity

activity_type.description: The type of activity (e.g., feeding, breeding)

breeding_date.description: The date of breeding, if applicable

breeding_notes.description: Notes specific to breeding, if applicable

created_at.description: The timestamp when the activity was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the activity was last updated

PaginatedActivityResource.title: Paginated Activity Resource
PaginatedActivityResource.description: A paginated collection of activity resources

HealthResource.title: Health Resource
HealthResource.description: A resource representing an animal's health record

Health_id.description: Unique identifier of the health record

health_status.description: Current health status of the animal

neutered_spayed.description: Whether the animal is neutered or spayed

last_vet_visit.description: Date of the last vet visit

created_at.description: Timestamp when the record was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

NoteResource.title: Note Resource
NoteResource.description: A resource representing a note associated with an animal

file_path.description: Path to an attached file, if any

add_to_calendar.description: Whether the note should be added to a calendar

due_date.description: Due date for the note, if applicable

created_at.description: Timestamp when the note was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the note was last updated

user_id.description: UUID of the user who created the note

created_at.description: Timestamp when the supplier was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the supplier was last updated

TaskResource.title: Task Resource
TaskResource.description: A resource representing a task associated with an animal

duration.description: Duration of the task in minutes

created_at.description: Timestamp when the task was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the task was last updated

count.description: Number of transactions in current page

transaction_date.description: Date and time of the transaction

transaction_status.description: Status of the transaction (e.g., pending, deposit_paid, paid)

payments.description: List of payments associated with the transaction

payment_date.description: Date and time of the payment

YieldRecordResource.title: Yield Record Resource
YieldRecordResource.description: A resource representing a production record
